FuncDef: The display dns domain command displays the configuration and sequence of domain name suffixes. The display dns domain command displays the configuration and sequence of domain name suffixes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Displays the detail information of domain name suffixes.
-
